item.description:
Qi gong for Weight Loss $50
Register by May 5th $45!
The workshop will start with goal setting and then we will have lunch, where you will learn how to cook with Qi. We will move into exercises and there will be some lecture, and discussion time. The workshop will close with a meditation. During the workshop we will discuss a 30 day regimen on how to incorporate specific foods, herbs, Qi Gong exercises, and meditation into your daily life. The goal will be to provide tools for empowerment to take your life into your hands. Allowing you to lose weight, feel good, and love yourself.

contact Erik at chiforhealing@gmail.com or 860-593-8397 to register today!
item.name: Qi Gong for Healthy Weight Loss
